mil7.3.4:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sālakalyāṇikāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.3.4:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, sālakalyāṇikā nāma antopathaviyaṃyeva abhivaḍḍhati hatthasatampi bhiyyopi;
mil7.3.4:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena cattāri sāmaññaphalāni catasso paṭisambhidā chaḷabhiññāyo kevalañca samaṇadhammaṃ suññāgāreyeva paripūrayitabbaṃ.
mil7.3.4:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sālakalyāṇikāya ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
